casebody.data:
OLIPHANT FINANCIAL CORPORATION
v.
Alvin SILVER, and Glendora N. Silver. No. 557P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Alvin Silver, Pro Se, for Silver. Glendora N. Silver, Pro Se. Claudi Reisch Clontz, Charlotte, for Oliphant.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of December 2008 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2009."
